name: fal-ai-master
description: Complete fal.ai generative media platform expertise for Claude Code. PROACTIVELY activate for: (1) ANY fal.ai task, (2) AI image generation (FLUX, Stable Diffusion), (3) AI video generation (Kling, Sora, LTX), (4) Audio processing (Whisper, TTS), (5) 3D generation, (6) fal-client Python integration, (7) @fal-ai/client JavaScript/TypeScript integration, (8) fal serverless deployment, (9) Custom ML model deployment, (10) GPU compute (H100/H200/B200), (11) Real-time/WebSocket connections, (12) Queue-based execution, (13) fal.media CDN uploads, (14) ComfyUI workflows, (15) Cost optimization strategies. Provides: Complete API reference for 600+ models, client library patterns (JS/Python), serverless deployment with fal.App, real-time streaming, WebSocket integration, model selection guidance, performance optimization, authentication patterns, error handling, production best practices.
